Articles.Content:
OK, so the clues in the title but I was just wondering, what is your Q&A about KSP?

Heres mine......

Q: why have I not played any other game in over a year other than KSP?

A: It's that damn good

Probably not the most original thread ever asked, but its open for anyone to say anything, Q&A about KSP from themselves. Im actually looking forward to reading what you put, should you could be bothered, but if not, im not, if you understand

Edited January 30, 2016 by maceemiller
Missing space
